units.name: Rainbow Guard
abilities: Must be attached to 'Renly Baratheon, King in the South'

abilities.name: Shifting Loyalties
effect:
Alester begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time Alester Claims a zone, after resolving that zone's effect, you may remove 1 Order Token from him. If you do, move him to any empty zone, or switch zones with any other NCU.

abilities.name: Support Of Haystack Hall
effect:
Each time Shyra Claims [CROWN], restore 1 Wound to 1 friendly Combat Unit.
Each time Shyra Claims [LETTER], remove 1 Condition Token from 1 friendly Combat Unit.
Each time Shyra Claims [MONEY], if you remove a token, place 1 Condition Token of that type on 1 enemy Combat Unit.

abilities.name: Sacrifice To The Lord Of Light
effect:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
When Melisandre Influences a friendly unit, you may have them suffer 2 Wounds and 1 Panic Test. If you do, target 1 enemy Combat Unit in Long Range. That enemy suffers 1 Panic Test with -2 to their roll and +2 Wounds on failure.
While influencing a friendly unit, that unit is a R'hllor unit and its Melee Attacks gain **Vicious**.

abilities.name: Smuggler's Cunning
effect:
Davos begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time a friendly unit Charges, after rolling Charge Distance Dice, you may remove 1 token from Davos. If you do, you may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice.
Each time a friendly unit Activates, you may remove 1 token from Davos. If you do, until the end of the Turn, enemies engaged with that unit may not use Orders or be the target of friendly Tactics cards.

abilities.name: Fervent Conviction
effect:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing a unit, it gains +1 to Morale Test rolls and, each time it passes a Morale test, 1 enemy it is engaged with suffers 1 Wound.

abilities.name: Necessary Sacrifices
effect: Once per game, when a friendly Combat Unit would be destroyed, instead, that unit is not destroyed and remains in play with D3 Wounds. Until the end of the game, it is a R'hllor unit.

abilities.name: In R'hllor's Name
effect:
**Influence** *(When this unit Claims a zone, attach this card to a Combat Unit until the end of the Round)*:
While Influencing an enemy unit, each time they fail a Panic Test, they become **Weakened**.
While Influencing an enemy unit, if they are engaged with a R'hllor unit, they suffer +1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.

abilities.name: A Rose and its Thorns
effect: Each time Margaery Claims a zone, you may target 1 friendly Combat Unit. They restore 1 Wound. You may then target 1 enemy engaged with that unit. They become **Vulnerable**.

abilities.name: Pulling Weeds
effect:
Each time Olenna Claims a zone, target 1 enemy NCU and choose 1:
• That NCU loses all Abilities until the end of the Round.
• If that NCU Claims a zone this Round, before resolving that zone's effect, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. They suffer D3 Hits and becomes **Weakened**.

abilities.name: Elderly Caution
effect:
Each time Eldon Claims a zone, you may replace that Zone's effect with: 
*Draw 3 Tactics Cards, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into your Tactics Deck.*

abilities.name: Castellan’s Duty
effect:
Cortnay begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
Each time an enemy NCU activates, you may remove 1 Order token from Cortnay. If you do, choose 2 zones. If that NCU Claims either zone this Turn, before resolving that zone's effect, target any number of friendly Combat Units. Restore D3+2 Wounds *(total)* across these units.

abilities.name: Sacrifice for the King
effect: At the start of any Round, you may Activate Cressen. If you do, destroy Cressen at the end of the Round.

abilities.name: Loving Counsel
effect:
Each time Cressen Claims [CROWN], you may replace that zone's effect with:
*Draw 2 Tactics cards and place any 1 Condition Token on an enemy Combat Unit.*

abilities.name: Misunderstood Omens
effect:
Patchface begins the game with 3 Order tokens on him.
At the start of any Round, you may spend 1 Order token from him. If you do, you may state the name of a Tactics card. If your opponent has 1 or more Tactics card in their hand with that name, they must discard 1 Tactics card with that name.

attachments.name: Loras Tyrell
attachments.subname: Lord Commander of the Rainbow Guard

text.trigger: After an enemy completes an Attack:
effect: The Attacker becomes **Panicked**  or **Vulnerable**.
If you Control [CROWN] or [LETTER],  the Attacker becomes **Panicked**  and **Vulnerable** instead.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit gains a Condition token:
effect: Remove that token. You may then target 1 enemy engaged with that unit. They gain 1 Condition token of that type.
If you Control [LETTER], target 1 other enemy in Long Range. They gain 1 Condition token of that same type.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: Choose 1. For each zone you Control among [CROWN] or [LETTER], choose +1:
• This Attack gains +1 to Hit.
• This Attack gains **Sundering**.
• This Attack gains **Vicious**.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: If this unit began the Turn engaged with the Defender, it rolls its highest Attack Die Value.
If the Defender has more remaining  ranks than the Attacker, it may  re-roll any Attack Dice.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit passes a Morale Test:
effect: That unit restores 2 Wounds.
If you Control [CROWN], all enemies they are engaged with suffer 1 Panic Test.
If you Control [LETTER], each enemy they are engaged with gains 1 Condition token.

text.trigger: After an enemy completes a Melee Attack:
effect: For each Wound the Defender suffered, the Attacker suffers 1 Hit.
If you Control [CROWN], the Attacker suffers -1 to Defense Dice rolls against these Hits.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit and attach this card to them until the end of the game. When a friendly Infantry or Cavalry unit is destroyed, place 1 Order token on this card.
While this card has a token, the attached unit gains:
This unit suffers -1 Wound from failing Panic Tests.
While you Control [CROWN], each time this unit performs a Melee Attack, the Defender gains 1 Condition token.

text.trigger: When a friendly NCU Claims a zone, replace that zone's effect with:
effect: Choose 1:
*• Move 1 friendly Attachment from 1 unit to another friendly unit without an Attachment in Long Range.*
*• Attach 1 previously destroyed friendly Attachment to 1 friendly Combat Unit without an Attachment (replacing a model as usual).*

text.trigger: After a friendly unit not containing Renly Baratheon is Attacked:
effect: Renly's unit performs 1 Attack or Charge Action on the Attacker. This Attack rolls its highest Attack Die Value.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Draw 1 Tactics card.

text.trigger: When an enemy Commander's unit Activates:
effect: Choose 1:
• If that enemy is in Long Range of Renly's unit, that Commander loses all Abilities until the end of the Round.
• Renly's unit performs 1 Maneuver or Retreat Action.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: If the enemy Commander has been destroyed, Renly Baratheon's unit restores 2 Wounds.

text.trigger: When an enemy is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: That enemy performs 1 Morale Test. On a failure, they become **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.
If they are in Short Range of Loras Tyrell's unit, they suffer -2 to their roll.

text.trigger: Start of an enemy Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly unit. It performs 1 Morale Test. If it is engaged with an enemy with more remaining ranks, it passes this test.
On a success, attach this card to the friendly unit until the end of the game.
While attached, each time that unit is Attacked, before resolving that Attack, the Attacker suffers 1 Hit, +1 Hit for each of the Defender's remaining ranks.

text.trigger: When a friendly Combat  Unit Activates:
effect: All enemies engaged with this unit  with the same or more remaining  ranks become **Vulnerable**.
Then, this unit restores  1 Wound, +1 Wound for  each of its destroyed ranks.

text.trigger: When a friendly Attachment is destroyed:
effect: Attach this card to 1 enemy unit in Short Range until the end of the game. When that unit is destroyed, gain 1 Victory Point.

text.trigger: When an enemy Attachment is destroyed:
effect: Attach this card to 1 friendly unit in Short Range until the end of the game. While attached, that unit's Melee Attacks roll +1 Attack Die and it gains +1 to Morale Test rolls.

text.trigger: When an enemy is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: The Attacker suffers  1 Hit for each Miss.
If the Defender is Eldon’s unit,  this Attack also suffers -1 to Hit.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit and attach this card to it until the end of the game. While attached, this unit's Melee Attacks gain the following bonuses, based on the Game Round *(effects are cumulative)*:
**3+:** May re-roll any Misses
**4+:** **Sundering**
**5+:** **Critical Blow**
**6+:** +2 Attack Dice

text.trigger: When your Commander's unit Activates:
effect: Instead of this unit performing an Action this Turn, target 1 friendly unit in Long Range. It performs 1 Attack or Charge Action.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit. Remove 1 Order token from that unit. They may use that Order again this Round.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Discard this card and 1 other card to return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.
If you Control [LETTER], you only have to discard this card.

text.trigger: When an opponent plays a Tactics card, before resolving that Tactics card:
effect: Roll a die: On a 3+, cancel the  effect of that Tactics Card.
If you Control [CROWN] or [LETTER],  cancel the effect of that Tactics  card on a 2+ instead.
If you Control both, this roll  automatically succeeds.

text.trigger: When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:
effect: Replace that zone's effect with:
*Choose 1:*
*• Restore 3 Wounds (total) across any number of friendly Combat Units.*
*• Remove all Condition tokens from each friendly Combat Unit. For each token removed, deal 1 enemy engaged with that unit 1 Wound.*

tactics.name: Younger, Bolder, And Far More Comely

text.trigger: When a friendly unit passes a Morale Test:
effect: Attach this card to that unit until  Renly Baratheon's unit is destroyed.
While attached, and this unit is in  Long Range of Renly's unit, this  unit's Melee Attacks gain +1 Attack  Die and this unit restores 1 Wound  each time this unit Activates.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Draw 1 Tactics card.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Choose 1:
• Draw 1 Tactics card.
• Target all friendly units in Short Range of Renly Baratheon's unit. They restore 1 Wound.
• Target all enemies in Short Range of Renly Baratheon's unit. They suffer 1 Wound.

tactics.name: Will Of The One True King

text.trigger: When a friendly NCU Claims [CROWN]:
effect: Replace that zone's effect with:
*1 enemy Combat Unit becomes **Panicked**.*
*1 enemy Combat Unit becomes **Vulnerable**.*
*1 enemy Combat Unit becomes **Weakened**.*

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 enemy unit. Remove any number of Condition tokens from that unit. For each token removed, that enemy loses 1 Ability until the end of the Round.

text.trigger: Start of the Round:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit. Attach this card to that unit until the end of the game.
While attached, each time this unit is performing a Melee Attack, after rolling Attack Dice, you may expend 1 Condition Token from the Defender. If you do, this Attack deals +D3 Wounds.
If this targets Stannis' unit, deal 3 Wounds instead of rolling.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack gains 1 of the following.  If this targets a R'hllor unit, gain both:
• **Critical Blow** • **Sundering**
After completing this Attack, if the  Defender was not destroyed, the  Attacker suffers 1 Panic Test.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly R'hllor unit. That unit performs 1 Morale Test.
On a success, that unit removes  all Condition tokens.
Attach this card to that unit.
Remove this card after an enemy  completes an Attack on this unit.
While attached, this unit gains +1  to Defense Dice rolls.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Panic Test, after rolling dice:
effect: That unit can only suffer a maximum of 1 Wound if they fail this test.
If this targets a R'hllor unit, it passes this test instead, and all enemies engaged with it become **Panicked**.

text.trigger: After an enemy completes a Melee Attack:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit other than the Defender. They perform 1 Maneuver Action. If this targets Davos' unit, it may pivot then perform 1 March Action instead.

text.remove: Before the game begins, remove the "Final Strike" Tactics card from your Tactics Deck and replace it with this card.

text.trigger: Start of any Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly Infantry unit. That  unit suffers up to 3 Wounds, then  target 1 other friendly Infantry unit  and restore 1+ that many Wounds  to that unit. If they do not have an  Attachment, as 1 of their restored  Wounds, you may attach 1  previously destroyed friendly  Infantry Attachment to that unit.

text.trigger: When an enemy fails a Panic Test:
effect: Target 1 friendly unit  in Long Range.
For each Wound that  enemy suffered from this  test, restore 1 Wound to  that friendly unit, up to 3.
If you Control [CROWN], that enemy  suffers +1 Wound and that friendly  unit restore +1 Wound *(to a  maximum of 4)*.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit Activates:
effect: That unit cannot perform Actions this Turn. Target 1 enemy in Short Range. It Activates, but does not perform any Actions.
If this targets Davos' unit, you may have both units restore 2 Wounds.

text.trigger: When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:
effect: Replace that zone's effect with:
*1 friendly Combat Unit performs 1 Attack Action.*
*If this targets Andrew Estermont's unit, it may perform 1 Charge Action instead.*

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Melee Attack, before rolling Attack Dice:
effect: This Attack gains **Vicious** and rolls its highest Attack Die Value. After completing this Attack, the Attacker suffers 2 Wounds, -1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing a Charge Action, before rolling Charge Distance Dice:
effect: This unit automatically counts as rolling a 6 on all Charge Distance Dice and their Melee Attack gains **Critical Blow**.
After this Attack has been completed, unless the Attacker is Andrew Estermont's unit, they become **Vulnerable**.

text.trigger: When a friendly unit is performing  a Charge Action, before resolving  that Action:
effect: This unit automatically counts as  rolling a 6 on all Charge Distance  Dice and enemies Successfully  Charged become **Panicked**.
After this Attack has been completed,  unless the Attacker is a R'hllor unit, the  Attacker becomes **Vulnerable**.

text.trigger: When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:
effect: Replace that zone's effect with:
*Target 1 enemy Combat Unit.*
*That enemy suffers 1 Panic Test with -1 to their roll for each enemy R'hllor unit in Short Range. On a failure, in addition to suffering Wounds, they also become **Vulnerable** and **Weakened**.*

text.trigger: When a R'hllor unit Activates:
effect: This unit performs a Morale Test.
On a success, 1 enemy engaged  with this unit suffers 1 Panic Test  with -1 for each remaining rank  in this unit.
On a failure, 1 enemy engaged  with this unit becomes **Panicked**.

text.trigger: When a friendly Cavalry Unit is performing a Retreat Action, before rolling Retreat Distance Dice:
effect: Enemies this unit disengages from cannot pivot. After this unit completes its Retreat Action, it may perform 1 Maneuver Action.
If this targets Stannis Baratheon's unit, it also restores D3 Wounds, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.

text.trigger: When an unengaged friendly Cavalry Unit Activates:
effect: Once this Turn, if that unit performs a Maneuver Action, it gains +3 [MOVEMENT] for that Maneuver Action. Then, it becomes **Vulnerable**.

text.trigger: When an enemy ends a Maneuver, March, or Retreat Action:
effect: Target 1 friendly Cavalry Unit in Long Range that can Charge that enemy.

It performs 1 Charge Action on that enemy. If it Successfully Charges that enemy, instead of performing a Melee Attack, that enemy becomes **Panicked** and suffers 2 Hits for each remaining rank in this unit.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 2 friendly Infantry units in Long Range of each other. Remove up to 4 models from 1 of these units. Restore that many Wounds to the other.
You may then move 1 Attachment from 1 of these units to the other *(replacing 1 model as normal, and keeping usual Attachment restrictions)*, or switch 2 friendly Attachments in those units.

text.trigger: After an enemy completes a Melee Attack:
effect: Target the Defender. They perform 1 Retreat Action.
If this targets Justin Massey's unit, it may re-roll any Retreat Distance Dice.

text.trigger: After an enemy completes a Melee Attack:
effect: Target the Defender. They remove all Condition tokens. If they have 1 destroyed rank, they restore 1 Wound. If they have 2 destroyed ranks, they restore 3 Wounds. If this targeted Justin Massey's unit, restore +1 Wound.

text.trigger: When an enemy ends a Maneuver, March or Retreat Action:
effect: Target 1 friendly Infantry Unit in Long Range that can Charge that enemy.

It becomes **Vulnerable** and performs 1 Charge Action on that enemy. If it Successfully Charges that enemy, instead of performing a Melee Attack, that enemy suffers 2 Hits for each remaining rank in this unit. If this targets Renly Baratheon's unit, it may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice.

text.trigger: Start of a friendly Turn:
effect: Target 1 friendly Combat Unit.
That unit performs 1 Morale Test.  For each zone you Control among  [CROWN] and [LETTER], they gain +1  to their roll.
On a success, each enemy they are  engaged with performs 1 Panic Test.
If this targets Renly's unit, on a  success, each enemy in Short Range  suffers 1 Panic Test instead.

text.trigger: When an enemy NCU Claims a Zone:
effect: After resolving that zone's effect,  move that NCU to any empty zone.
If you removed them from [CROWN] or  [LETTER], target 1 enemy Combat unit.  It suffers 1 Panic Test.
